member.name: M:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.#ctor(Ecng.Common.IdGenerator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .

member.name: F:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.RtsMinAvailableTime
member.summary: The earliest date in RTS, for which there are historical data.

member.name: F:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.UxMinAvailableTime
member.summary: The earliest date in UX, for which there are historical data.

member.name: P:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.DbfDirectory
member.summary: The path to the folder with historical data in the DBF format.
member.remarks: If the value is an empty string, the data in the DBF format are not processed.

member.name: P:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.TxtDirectory
member.summary: The path to the folder with historical data in CSV and Excel formats.
member.remarks: If the value is an empty string, the data in CSV and Excel formats are not processed.

member.name: P:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.SaveRtsStdTrades
member.summary: To save trades for RTS Standard instruments. The default is off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.SaveRtsStdCombinedOnly
member.summary: To merge trades for RTS Standard instruments (trades for T+N are not divided by folders). The default is off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.RtsHistory.RtsHistoryMessageAdapter.IsSystemOnly
member.summary: To save only system trades. The default is enabled.
